ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: no offence but this was pretty stooopid. I dont want to start a flame war, but this is an eaven larger problem then farming. I have been stolen from several
ygData.messageBody:
no offence but this was pretty stooopid.
I dont want to start a flame war, but this is an eaven larger problem then
farming. I have been stolen from several times, what do I do.
If its done more then once I usualy give 1 ooc msg and leave it at that.
Man it is afterall a game,,,,eaven if I spend about 6h online everyday. The
only thing this post did was to send shivers down my spine.

eeeeep

Vashi

>
>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
>I simply expect people not to FARM items.....greedy bastards.
>
>Well, I'm going to remove myself from the list. I don't care to be on a
>list where we have people activly encouraging people to be dicks
